thread.section_title: Globus Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Globus | globusjourneys.com | 2 of 44
thread.title: CHARLES SWIFT

author: CHARLES SWIFT
title: CHARLES SWIFT
text: We had a great trip to Ireland. We picked a great time to go. Our Tour Director was phenomenal. She was knowledgeable, personable, fun, professional, smart and friendly all wrapped up into one person. Our driver was just as good. We had a great group of tour mates who we were with. The accommodations were great. The sites and activities were fun, educational and breath taking. The pubs were good and everything was reasonable. Good trip. I would recommend it.
